name: Escape The Ledge: Octagon
description:
ESCAPE THE LEDGE: OCTAGON


>>(Looking for Linux testers! Let us know if it works!)<<


What is The Ledge? 
Is it possible to host a dream in an aetheric web of existence? Someone said: yes, it is.
What if you can explore one of them? Go, now, start your astral travel and reach The Ledge of the Creation, where inconscious and reality can really exist together.

Octagon is the perfect world of his creator, who loved classicism and stillness.


HOW TO PLAY: 

Mouse Left Click: Navigate, collect, equip and use items

Mouse Right Click: Drop equipped items / Check multiple inventory items.

FEATURES: 

. Collect 7 hidden secrets and find out your special prize!

. Hand drawn backgrounds and animations.

. Immersive atmosphere.

. English only language.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: 

No installation needed! Just unzip and enjoy.

IMPORTANT: 

. If you have issues with the mouse speed, you can easily fix it in the Gamesetup located in the same folder which includes the exe.

CREDITS:
